column1: #Text=Zuko says : " The Avatar 's on Kyoshi Island ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " I was going to save it for later !
#Text=" Aang says : " These people sure know how to treat an Avatar !
#Text=" Aang says : " Mmm ... Katara you 've got to try these !
#Text=" Katara says : " Well , maybe just a bite .
#Text=" Aang says : " Sokka , what 's your problem ?
